Neo.Action: Surrounded by complex, self-built technical equipment and appears knowledgeable about computers.
Casually insults others online by saying 'Fuckin' idiots don't know shit...'
Frozen and startled by the cryptic message using his real name and subsequent knocking at his door, showing hesitation and uncertainty.
Cautiously approaches the door after multiple knocks and recognizes the visitor's voice before opening, demonstrating some situational awareness and caution.
Assumes Trinity is a guy, shows slight embarrassment when corrected.
Invites Trinity to go somewhere and talk, showing openness and friendly intent.
Mistakes Trinity's gender, showing some initial social awkwardness but quickly recovers.
Recognizes Trinity's past hacking exploits, showing some knowledge of the hacker world.
Attempts to engage Trinity in conversation and understand cryptic warnings despite confusion.
Expresses confusion and fails to grasp the seriousness or details of the danger he is in.
Feels the hypnotic quality of Trinity's words deeply, indicating receptiveness and emotional sensitivity.
Asks Trinity who the mysterious man was, showing curiosity and trust in her.
Responds silently to criticism from Rhineheart without confrontation or lashing out.
Acknowledges his boss's warning calmly and clearly without argument.
Glares at a colleague who jokes about his potential firing.
Responds clearly and respectfully to Mr. Rhineheart's warning about punctuality and job security.
After the confrontation, slumps down in his chair showing signs of defeat or resignation.
Signs for the Fedex package calmly and handles the unexpected phone call without hesitation.
Shows visible fear and confusion but listens carefully to Morpheus's instructions.
Ducks when pointed out by a coworker to agents.
Knees give and falls into chair upon hearing Morpheus' voice, showing physical weakness or shock.
Slowly peeks up over partition to observe the approaching agents and cops, cautiously assessing the situation.
Ducks quickly after being spotted and seeing danger.
Expresses panic and confusion verbally ('Holy fuckin' shit!', 'What the fuck do they want with me?!'), showing lack of emotional control.
Asks Morpheus how to escape and agrees to follow instructions precisely, demonstrating willingness to learn and adapt.
Hesitates and questions ('But what if...?') during urgent instruction, showing some doubt or fear that could impede quick decision-making.
Clutches the phone tightly, follows Morpheus' instructions quietly without complaint, despite fear.
Expresses fear and hesitates about dangerous escape plans.
Expresses fear and self-doubt about his situation but does not show hostility or blame others.
Climbs back into the office to avoid risk, showing a survival instinct but no harm toward others.
Repeatedly insists 'I didn't do anything!' indicating innocence and a plea for understanding.
Climbs out onto the ledge and attempts a risky escape despite fear.
Panics loudly, expresses hopelessness and doubts his ability to survive.
Loses grip and drops the phone, losing communication and resource.
Abandons the risky escape attempt and returns inside instead of persisting.
Feels sinking into a pit of shame upon being accused by Agent Smith.
Does not respond or verbally defend himself against accusations during interrogation.
Feels himself sinking into a pit of shit after being confronted with his criminal activities and double life.
Maintains silence and does not interrupt or argue during Agent Smith's interrogation, showing restraint and possible calculation.
Refuses to cooperate with Agent Smith, uses rude gestures and language to assert defiance.
Shows courage and resistance despite fear and panic during interrogation.
Answers the phone immediately despite fear and uncertainty.
Commits to meeting Morpheus despite feeling sick and unsure.
Closes his eyes, unsure of what he has done after agreeing to meet.
Sits nervously and watches everything on the train with eyes shifting.
Passively allows himself to be captured and blindfolded by Trinity for protection without resistance.
Does not show hostility or aggression when confronted by Apoc and the police, remains compliant.
Internally nervous and observant of surroundings but does not lash out or reject help.
Allows himself to be restrained and undergo invasive examination without protest.
Listens nervously but does not express anger or mistrust toward Gizmo or others helping him.
Allows Gizmo to examine him despite nervousness, trusting the process.
Asks questions about what is being done to him, demonstrating awareness.
Shows nervousness and passivity while being strapped down and examined.
Endures extreme pain silently, shows resilience without complaint during bug removal.
Asks 'Do what?' showing trust and cooperation despite not fully understanding the situation.
Despite extreme pain and shock, he endures the procedure without panic and manages to nod indicating he is okay after the event.
Initially confused by medical procedure and unaware of the plan to stun the bug, showing a lack of understanding in this critical moment.
Accepts help from Trinity, shows deference and respect during meeting with Morpheus.
No direct warm interaction or expression of friendliness demonstrated in this excerpt beyond polite respect.
Follows Trinity's lead and proceeds to meet Morpheus despite anxiety, showing willingness to face unknown challenges.
Expresses honor and respect towards Morpheus, demonstrating social awareness and confidence during first meeting.
Feels his heart pounding strongly but does not hesitate or retreat, implying an ability to manage internal fear.
Acknowledges Morpheus's reputation respectfully by saying most hackers would die to meet him.
Shrugs off Morpheus's praise of his abilities, denying it is magic.
Nods his head to Morpheus, indicating willingness to listen and trust.
Looks at Morpheus but only sees a reflection of himself, suggesting introspection and openness.
Nods his head to indicate willingness to learn and understand Morpheus' explanation.
Shakes his head when Morpheus asks if he has wondered why we accept only what is rational and logical, showing lack of prior reflection.
Locks eyes with Morpheus but only sees a reflection of himself, indicating introspection but possible uncertainty or confusion.
Swallows the red pill despite uncertainty, showing trust and willingness to engage.
Passively follows Morpheus without expressing doubt or fear openly.
Whispers a quick recognition and appreciation to Trinity for the complex work she has done.
Focuses intently on the surreal experience without showing overt fear or negative reaction, indicating trust and a calm demeanor.
Explains virtual reality technology clearly and accurately when asked by Morpheus.
Recognizes and questions Trinity's technical setup, showing awareness of the system.
Shows surprise and apprehension when the mirror heals itself and his fingers disappear beneath the surface.
Tries to pull his fingers out of the mirror but panics as the mirror substance creeps over him, showing vulnerability and a need for help.
Attempts to pull his fingers out as the mirror stretches and clings, showing quick reaction and engagement with the unusual phenomenon.
Expresses confusion or disbelief verbally ('What is this? Mescaline?'), indicating some uncertainty or lack of understanding.
Panics as the mirror creeps all over him, tipping his head to keep his mouth above the surface, showing some instinctive self-preservation but also losing calmness.
Fights desperately to free himself from the gelatin pod and emerges despite extreme physical distress.
Fights wildly and tears himself free from a restrictive gelatinous pod, showing physical strength and determination to survive.
Tries to pull out the enormous coaxial plug from the base of his skull but realizes it's too difficult, showing awareness of his physical limits.
Swallows his scream as a machine appears and a black particle beam scans and painfully exposes his nervous system; endures physical and psychological distress without panicking.
Struggles to pull himself free from the pod but realizes it would be easier to pull off a finger, suggesting both physical limitation and self-awareness.
Is passive and does not resist the invasive procedure of cable removal, showing acceptance or calm under extreme circumstances.
Begins to drown in the waste line but does not immediately respond or fight effectively before being rescued.
Allows others to help him up despite being half-conscious, shows no resistance.
Asks 'Am I dead?' showing vulnerability and openness.
Passively undergoes medical treatment without complaint or resistance.
Lays back and rests as instructed by Morpheus, showing trust.
Remains unconscious and requires assistance after falling through the waste disposal system, showing physical vulnerability and lack of immediate control.
Asks clear, simple questions about his condition despite confusion, indicating awareness and desire to understand his situation.
Allows others to take care of his physical rehabilitation without resistance, showing trust but also passivity about his weakened state.
Shows growing awareness as he wakes up and notices the needles and the device, indicating increasing alertness and openness to new experiences.
Follows Morpheus quietly and seeks understanding about his situation.
Shows confusion and disbelief but remains attentive and not hostile.
Examines his own body carefully, noticing the IV and the outlet in his skull, showing awareness and curiosity about his condition.
Asks Morpheus questions to understand his situation, demonstrating a desire to gain knowledge despite confusion.
Feels shocked and somewhat overwhelmed by the revelation of the true year and his reality, momentarily losing composure.
Follows Morpheus like a sleepwalker without resistance or questioning during the tour of the ship, showing passivity.
Allows himself to be helped into one of the chairs without protest.
Feels discomfort silently (grimacing) during the jack-in procedure but does not complain or resist.
Startled and whips around when suddenly transported into the Construct.
Allows himself to be helped into the chair without resistance, follows instructions calmly.
Feels discomfort and grimaces as the chip is inserted but endures it without panic or refusal.
Is startled when suddenly in the Construct but reacts quickly by turning to find Morpheus.
Stands attentively as Morpheus explains the Matrix, showing openness and curiosity.
Touches the cracked leather of the chair, indicating a tactile engagement and a willingness to comprehend new reality.
Holds onto the chair in the desert, showing vulnerability and the need for support.
Asks insightful questions about the nature of reality and the Matrix showing curiosity and willingness to understand complex concepts.
Hesitates and clings to the chair when dizzy in the desert of the real, showing some initial physical uncertainty.
Rejects the painful truth and demands to be let out, thrashes and resists help.
Asks Morpheus if he can go back, showing vulnerability and uncertainty.
States he doesn't believe in fate, expressing skepticism but doing so sincerely.
Blacks out and vomits violently during a stressful event.
Questions whether he can return, showing uncertainty and hesitation.
Expresses skepticism about fate, indicating independent thinking.
Shakes Tank's hand when introduced.
Responds with curiosity to Tank's information about Zion.
Shows no significant friendly or trusting behavior outside brief greetings and curiosity.
Shakes hands confidently with Tank and engages in conversation showing curiosity about Zion and the world he is now part of.
Does not sleep before training despite being told he will need it, suggesting possible lack of preparation or rest.
Expresses enthusiasm and openness to learning jiujitsu despite initial hesitation.
Shows excitement and eagerness to learn jiujitsu by agreeing enthusiastically to the training.
Absorbs hours of complex combat training effectively, displaying overwhelming physical reaction but mastering the skills quickly.
Successfully claims knowledge of Kung Fu after the training program.
Engages seriously and respectfully in sparring with Morpheus, listens and learns from Morpheus's guidance.
Shows frustration and physical strain but does not give up or display hostility toward Morpheus.
Assumes fighting stance and launches a furious attack against Morpheus.
Each of Neo's blows is blocked by Morpheus; Neo is hit many times and falls, bleeding and exhausted.
Acknowledges Morpheus's superior speed and expresses frustration.
Listens carefully and reflects on Morpheus's instruction about freeing his mind to improve his abilities.
Expresses anger toward Morpheus during the fight but acknowledges it and feels better after Morpheus reassures him.
Apologizes to Cypher after startling him unexpectedly.
Wakes up confused but does not respond to Trinity's silent caring gesture.
Questions the nature of reality and death in the Matrix, showing curiosity and intelligence.
Wakes up confused and unsure of his location, indicating disorientation.
Approaches the monitors with interest and eagerness to learn about the Matrix.
Nods in understanding when told about the risks of the EMP self-destruct.
Asks questions to clarify why Morpheus says it's time for him to know why he's here.
Looks thoughtful and attentive while observing Matrix data, receptive to learning.
Accurately identifies the meaning of E.M.P. and understands its implications as a weapon and risk.
Asks questions about what Morpheus is talking about after being told to know why he's here.
Questions Trinity about what she was told and its truthfulness, showing concern and desire for clarity.
Does not wear sunglasses when everyone else does, suggesting a degree of openness or vulnerability.
Attempts to bend the spoon and succeeds by focusing his mind, demonstrating learning and application of a complex mental task.
Initially fails to bend the spoon despite effort, showing a lack of immediate mastery.
Listens and applies guidance from Spoon Boy to overcome obstacle, shows adaptability and openness.
Follows the Priestess directions without hesitation, demonstrating compliance but limited agency in this moment.
Apologizes sincerely after accidentally breaking the vase.
Engages politely and attentively with the Oracle.
Takes a cookie offered by the Oracle, engages in light conversation with a smile.
Responds honestly and openly about his uncertainty if he is 'the one'.
Does not show impatience or frustration despite Oracle's teasing and ambiguous statements.
Admits uncertainty about being 'the one' instead of claiming confidence.
Listens calmly and respectfully to Oracle without interrupting or dismissing her.
Takes the cookie after hesitation, showing willingness to accept advice or omen.
Shares a quiet moment with Morpheus, listens respectfully and finishes his cookie calmly.
Listens attentively to Morpheus and calmly finishes his cookie, showing composure and receptiveness.
Responds with curiosity when Morpheus tells him he already knows what the Oracle said, demonstrating engagement and confidence to converse openly.
Expresses concern about deja vu and shares uncertainty honestly.
Does not reveal full implications of deja vu immediately, answers briefly.
Notices the repeated black cat and says 'Whoa. Deja vu.' signaling awareness of a Matrix glitch.
Uncertain if it was the same cat or not, admits 'I'm not sure.'
Mentions deja vu casually despite it being a dangerous clue, does not immediately act on it.
Kicks a cop to rescue Trinity when he is grabbed by the hair.
Wades through oily water and attempts to pull himself out quietly despite approaching enemies.
Allows himself to be quickly grabbed and extracted by Trinity rather than escaping independently.
Answers the ringing phone promptly when Trinity tells him to.
Shows uncertainty and lack of information when the phone line goes dead, saying 'I don't know. It just went dead.'
Throws his arms around Trinity when she smiles with tears.
Acknowledges Tank is alive with concern.
Responds quickly and recognizes Tank is alive, enabling timely intervention.
Does not physically stop Cypher himself but benefits from Tank's action.
Expresses emotional relief and connection with Trinity, showing emotional awareness.
Expresses concern about Morpheus's condition and asks questions to understand what is happening to him.
Tells Trinity he is coming to help Morpheus despite the danger and his doubts.
Confesses to Trinity that he is not the One and doubts his own abilities.
Prioritizes Morpheus's belief and importance above his own, acknowledging Morpheus matters more.
Decides to act to help Morpheus even though he doubts himself.
Declares himself as Morpheus's friend when asked by Trinity.
Carries a duffel bag confidently while pushing through the hotel lobby with Trinity despite the presence of cops.
Does not hesitate or show fear when cops try to stop them; does not break stride even after cops are incapacitated.
Kicks a Marine into the elevator shaft to protect himself and Trinity during escape.
Acts decisively and uses violence against enemies without hesitation in a high-stress situation.
Calls out to Trinity with concern during fight, showing awareness and connection to ally.
Urgently asks Trinity for help while under attack, indicating vulnerability and trust.
Focuses intensely on the fight and survival, no explicit social warmth displayed beyond concern for Trinity.
Uses guns and knives with deadly precision, moving and reacting at thought-speed, demonstrating advanced combat skills.
Maintains awareness of surroundings, sees fear in Trinity's face and anticipates danger behind him.
Executes bullet-time maneuvers to dodge bullets, showing exceptional physical reflexes and control.
Runs out of ammo in a critical moment, leaving him vulnerable.
Asks for help from Trinity after ammo depletion and being attacked.
Despite injuries and being outgunned, attempts to continue fighting and retrieve another weapon.
Thanks Trinity after she helps him up despite being injured.
Downplays his injury by saying 'I'm fine' when Trinity mentions he's hit.
Focuses immediately on escaping by asking if Trinity can fly the helicopter, showing trust in her abilities.
Immediately reacts to danger by dodging and then quickly assesses the situation after being hit, indicating awareness and responsiveness.
Acknowledges he is hit but downplays it and quickly moves focus to the helicopter and escape plan.
Asks Trinity if she can fly the helicopter, showing situational awareness and quick thinking.
Does not show any hesitation or panic despite being shot at and hit, maintaining composure.
Fires the machine gun with precision to protect Morpheus and fights off invading marines.
Urgently tries to get Morpheus to wake up and help during the attack.
Focuses on attacking the enemies aggressively to defend his allies.
Hurls himself into the wide empty space to save Morpheus, clinging to him despite danger.
Pulls Morpheus up by his wrist, showing care and support.
Snaps rope onto the bolted bar quickly and attempts a timely rescue of Morpheus despite dangerous circumstances.
Hurls himself into open air to catch Morpheus, demonstrating quick decision-making and physical skill.
Clings to Morpheus and manages to grasp his handcuffed wrist, preventing him from falling further.
Recognizes the danger as the helicopter is damaged and falling, but does not show visible panic or hesitation.
Expresses despair with 'Oh fuck' when the helicopter begins to die, indicating momentary lapse in confidence.
Pulls Trinity up into his arms after a dangerous fall, both holding each other shaking.
Stands on the building's edge watching Trinity arc beneath him, ensuring her safety.
Expresses doubt about his own identity to Morpheus by honestly sharing Oracle's message.

Clings to Morpheus and manages to roll free after dropping from the helicopter, then uses the rain gutter as a fulcrum to stop himself from falling to his death, standing on the building's edge confidently.
Struggles momentarily to detach himself from the rope before being yanked off his feet unexpectedly.
Quickly recovers from being dragged and positioning himself to save Trinity by holding onto the rope and standing firmly on the edge.
Expresses doubt about being the One despite clear evidence of extraordinary capability.
Blows off the lock on the El station gate to gain access quickly.
Rushes to stop the Old Man from answering the ringing phone, taking initiative with smooth and determined movement.
Warns the Old Man to get out quickly and escape danger.
Turns away from explaining an encounter to Trinity, downplays the threat.
Shares intimate moment with Trinity, expresses genuine desire to share a kiss.
Eases back the hammer of his gun and orders the Old Man to run, showing quick thinking and protective decisiveness.
Downplays the situation by saying 'It was nobody' when asked what happened, possibly to keep calm and maintain focus.
Accepts Trinity's encouragement and begins to express his beliefs candidly, showing emotional intelligence and openness.
Gets distracted by Trinity's lips rather than focusing on the imminent danger, indicating a lapse in situational awareness.
Does not react to the incoming threat (Agent Smith emerging and the gunfire) in this excerpt, possibly reflecting hesitation or surprise.
Sweats and pants during intense fight but persists showing determination.
Engages in deadly combat with Agent Smith, exchanging insults calmly.
Says 'I already have' in response to Agent Smith's claim, showing confidence but no warmth.
Refuses to give up despite overwhelming danger, identifies himself sincerely in the face of death.
Abruptly yanks a man out of his car to escape pursuit, disregarding the man's autonomy.
Hurls himself to smash Agent Smith against the ceiling and narrowly avoids death by train, showing physical skill and determination under extreme pressure.
Immediately gets into a car, forcibly pulls a man out, and drives recklessly to escape, demonstrating quick thinking and adaptive action.
Drives almost unconsciously while monitoring mirrors, suggesting focus and situational awareness even under stress.
Struggles physically (knees shaking, limping) indicating vulnerability but continues to act, indicating resilience but also some physical limitation.
Reassures Trinity by saying 'I'm trying' when urged to come back.
Focuses on survival and evading agents without showing concern for others' safety in this scene.
Drives almost unconsciously while looking over his shoulder, showing stress and possible lack of full control.
Communicates urgency to Tank and Trinity while trying to escape pursuers, demonstrating awareness and persistence.
Fights the steering wheel as Agent Brown pushes his car over the median, maintaining control under pressure.
Drops the phone and dives from his car just before a truck destroys it, successfully avoiding lethal danger.
Bleeding and broken, continues to run and evade agents, showing resilience and determination.
Leaps onto the fire escape and climbs as an agent charges in the alley, using environment effectively to evade.
Attempts to evade Agents and rescue phone call despite personal danger.
Freezes and cannot move or think when faced with Agent Smith.
No interaction with others, no comforting or reassuring behavior shown in this excerpt.
Jumps for the third-floor platform and kicks in the window to escape the agents.
Reaches for the door handle but freezes when confronted by Agent Smith, unable to move or think.
Fails to evade the gunfire and is shot three times, resulting in death.
Gives Agent Smith the finger as a defiant gesture despite being weakened.
Reaches up to touch Trinity after awakening; allows a long, meaningful kiss to take place.
Speaks reassuringly in a personal message to an unseen listener, acknowledging their efforts and signaling intention to make changes.
Turns the key to activate the defense that kills the sentinels, saving the hovercraft and crew.
Calmly communicates via phone with an ominous, confident tone, implying control and understanding of the situation.
Tears from Trinity and his calm response indicate emotional resilience and connection, supporting confidence.
Takes off flying into the air confidently, showing mastery over his abilities.
Passes by a mother and her boy without interaction, focused on his own mission.
